actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure under the authority of the order of Jun 29, 84 without amendment. With written report No. 98-555.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1051.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize a land conveyance from the Department of Agriculture to Payson, Arizona.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to transfer specified land, without consideration, to the town of Payson, Arizona. Provides that title shall revert to the United States under specified conditions. Authorizes the Northern Gila County Historical Society to administer such property.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a land conveyance from the Department of Agriculture to Payson, Arizona.
